text: The Young Violets Vienna are the second team of FK Austria Wien. Till 2018 the name of the team was FK Austria Wien Amateure. The Young Violets are playing in the Regionalliga Ost, the third level in Austrian football. ==Leagues (Level in Austrian football)== *1998-05 Regionalliga Ost (3) *2005-2010 Erste Liga (2)In 2010 the association banned the participation of second teams in the first division. Austria Wien and Red Bull Juniors were relegated to Regionalliga. *2010-2018 Regionalliga Ost (3) *2018- 2023 2. Liga (2) *2023 - Regionalliga Ost (3) Transfermarkt.at (German) == Current squad == As of 7 February 2022.
